"Lady in the Water" is a unique and captivating film from M. Night Shyamalan, where an apartment building superintendent discovers a mysterious woman who seems to be a character from a bedtime story.

"Blow Out", on the other hand, offers a thrilling suspense with John Travolta as a movie sound recordist who uncovers a murder conspiracy while recording sounds for a movie. Both movies offer intriguing plots and compelling performances. Enjoy!
